prompts: Create a Pokemon that thrives in the forest, featuring vibrant colors and unique floral designs.
I want a quirky Pokemon with a round body and whimsical features, perfect for a grassland environment.
Generate a fun character that has playful personality traits and an unusual color palette.
Make a Pokemon with a striking floral headpiece and a small, stout body, suitable for urban settings.
Imagine a creature that blends into the grass with its earthy tones and vibrant accents.
Design a Pokemon with a cute but mischievous expression that would fit well in a cave habitat.
Show me a unique Pokemon that combines elements of both poison and grass types, with standout features.

distinctive_features: Large flower-like structure on top of the head
